item.title: ‘He spoke nothing but the truth:’ Suncoast remembers Charlie Kirk
item.description: Many people at the vigil said they remember Kirk as not just a political activist, but an man of God.

item.title: Sarasota County EMTs have new high-tech tool to help save lives
item.description: The ultrasound system allows paramedics to conduct live telemedicine consults in the field.

item.title: Federal Reserve cuts key rate for first time this year
item.description: The Federal Reserve cut its key interest rate by a quarter-point Wednesday.

item.title: Caught on camera: Police stop suspected drunk driver heading wrong way on I-4
item.description: The video shows Beall saying her husband was driving, even though she was alone in the vehicle.

item.title: Hundreds expected for LifeStory 5K/10K to support suicide prevention
item.description: The LifeStory 5K/10K is more than a race. It’s a moment of remembrance, resilience, and hope.
